name: Bubblehome
description:
Bubblehome is a game where you go from bubble to bubble.

In bubble you're safe and there is no gravity but outside you have strong gravity and you can die.

We recommend to play it with a controller, but if you want, you can play it with a keyboard. 
Arrows to move.
Space to dash.

This game was made for the global game jam 2019.

Made by :

Theophile Garnier : Game design and programming Twitter

Romain Rope : Sound design and music Twitter
